name: Saboteur Stocks
description: A local 2 player game created for the GMTK 2020 game jam! The stock market is out of control! You and your opponent are fighting to earn the most money by buying and selling stocks! But watch out - when sabotage time hits you will both lose control over your precious stocks, while at the same time gaining control over the stocks of your opponent! Use that time to ruin their profits before they ruin yours! The player with the highest overall profit wins!
